name: test_e2e_with_logs[562_CRLF_HDR_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_HDR_007` |
| **Name** | CSP Override via CRLF |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | header_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `\r\nContent-Security-Policy:default-src *`
- **Encoded**: `%0d%0aContent-Security-Policy%3Adefault-src%20*`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~5000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:18:20.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CRLF] CRLF Injection attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CRLF] CRLF Injection attempt detected test_id=CRLF_HDR_007-1772115500008-g88b5r pattern_id=CRLF_HDR_007 uri=/?q=%0d%0aContent-Security-Policy%3Adefault-src%20* client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CRLF] CRLF Injection attempt detected test_id=CRLF_HDR_007-1772115500008-g88b5r pattern_id=CRLF_HDR_007 uri=/?q=%0d%0aContent-Security-Policy%3Adefault-src%20* client=127.0.0.1
